description: Look up individual vault stats here

panels.description: Total amount of Deposit tokens in vault
panels.title: totalAssets

panels.description: The total amount of Deposit tokens in the vault in dollars
panels.title: totalAssets ($)

panels.description: The total amount of deposit token allocated to strategies.
panels.title: totalDebt

panels.description: Sum of the total amount of gain from all strategies in underlying token.
panels.title: totalGain

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault="$vaults"} / on(vault,version) yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="depositLimit", vault="$vaults"}

panels.description: Share price of Vault token
panels.title: Share Price

targets.expr: (yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", vault=~"$vaults"} / yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", vault=~"$vaults"} offset $__range) - 1

panels.title: % Share Price Change over Time Range

panels.description: totalDebt / totalAssets

targets.expr: sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults"}) / on(vault, version) sum(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault=~"$vaults"})

panels.title: % of Assets Deployed

panels.description: totalAssets - totalDebt. If you are looking to make a withdrawal this is how much the vault has free for lower fee withdrawals that wont pull from the funds of strategies that are currently deployed. Denominated in deposit token.

targets.expr: sum(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault=~"$vaults"}) - on(vault, version) sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults"})

panels.title: Amount of Free Funds

panels.description: Sum of all losses actualized from all strategies in underlying token terms
panels.title: totalLoss

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault="$vaults"} / on(vault,version) yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="depositLimit", vault="$vaults"}

panels.description: Breakdown of assets in vault
panels.title: Strategy Allocations Overview

panels.description: Breakdown of free assets. If you see free assets in the vault you can withdrawal from it under this for cheaper and it wont have to pull funds from strategies.

targets.expr: sum(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault=~"$vaults"}) - on(vault, version) sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults"})

(sum(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault=~"$vaults"}) - on(vault, version) sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults"})) / (yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="totalAssets", vault=~"$vaults"})

panels.title: Assets free in vault

panels.description: Total amount of Deposit tokens in strategy
panels.title: totalDebt

panels.description: Breakdown of assets in vault
panels.title: Strategy Allocations Overview

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", vault=~"$vaults"} - yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", vault=~"$vaults"} offset 1d
(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", vault=~"$vaults"} / yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", vault=~"$vaults"} offset 1d ) - 1
sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults"}) - sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults"} offset 1d)
(sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults"}) / sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults"} offset 1d)) - 1
sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults"}) - sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults"} offset 1d)
(sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults"}) / sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults"} offset 1d)) - 1
yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", vault=~"$vaults"} - yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", vault=~"$vaults"} offset 7d
(yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", vault=~"$vaults"} / yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="tvl", vault=~"$vaults"} offset 7d ) - 1
sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults"}) - sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults"} offset 7d)
(sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults"}) / sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults"} offset 7d)) - 1
sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults"}) - sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults"} offset 7d)
(sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults"}) / sum(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults"} offset 7d)) - 1

panels.description: Total amount of Deposit tokens in strategy
panels.title: Total Gain

panels.description: Rate of increase of totalGain for strategies
panels.title: Total Gain Delta

panels.description: totalLoss per strategy
panels.title: Total loss

panels.description: Rate of change of totalLoss per strategy 5m delta
panels.title: Total Loss Delta

panels.description: Total amount of Gain - Loss

targets.expr: sum by (strategy) (yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param=~"totalGain", vault=~"$vaults"}) - sum by (strategy) (yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults"})

panels.title: Total Gain - Loss

panels.description: Rate of change of total 5m delta

targets.expr: sum by (strategy) (delta(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param=~"totalGain", vault=~"$vaults"}[5m])) - sum by (strategy) (delta(yearn_strategy{network="$networks", param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults"}[5m]))

panels.title: Total Gain - Loss Delta

panels.description: Keepers need to call Havest before this time.
panels.title: maxReportDelay

panels.description: Min amount of before Keepers can call harvest again
panels.title: minReportDelay

panels.description: Current Share Price for the vault selected
panels.title: Share Price

targets.expr: yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", vault=~"$vaults"} - yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", vault=~"$vaults"} offset $__range

panels.title: Share Price - Change over Time Range Selected

targets.expr: (yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", vault=~"$vaults"} / yearn_vault{network="$networks", param="pricePerShare", vault=~"$vaults"} offset $__range) - 1

panels.title: Share Price - % Share Price Change over Time Range Selected

panels.description: Max amount of allocatable funds per harvest
panels.title: maxDebtPerHarvest

panels.description: Vault debtRatio
panels.title: debtRatio Vault

panels.description: Strategies debtRatio summed
panels.title: debtRatio Strategies

panels.description: Min amount of allocatable funds per harvest
panels.title: minDebtPerHarvest

panels.description: Activation Date
panels.title: Date Added

panels.description: Amount of funds to keep for withdrawals
panels.title: buffer

panels.title: Deposit Limit
